about_the_game:
Producers from different generations came together from Taiwan, Japan, Shanghai, Singapore and Malaysia in order to create the twenty original pieces. Features the Living National Treasure Yang Hsiu-Ching, Golden Bell Awards winner SiNg Wu, and Best Taiwanese Album of Golden Melody Awards winner KoDaBow.

Taiwanese traditional instruments are combined with modern music in the production. The goal is to immerse the players in the bustling Dadaocheng ambience during the Japanese occupation period. On top of this, every level, scene, and character has its exclusive bespoke soundtrack, helping players remember their gaming experience.

Our team worked with the beauty of Taiwan in their mind and close to their heart. We hope that through our gaming platform, Switch & Steam, our music can invoke the glory of our beloved Taiwan and the world would be drawn into her beauty.
